title: Europe : forecasted distribution of golfers in 2020 , by age group
summary: This statistic shows the Share of average forecasted a distribution golfers 2020 at least once in the by 18 group in the group from 20 or younger to 50 to 60 years .
In 50 to 60 years , 42 % of Europe average had attended a distribution golfers 2020 at least once in the by Year .
